name: Neon Slash (24h)
description:
Use mouse to drag selecting the Direction and Force of the movement!

Point collecting game that I've developed in 24 Hours! 

Try to get most points without dying, post your highscore in the comments!

I'll post a video of the development process in my Youtube Channel!

This is the version that I've ended with at the end of the 24 hours, I'll keep developing it until it's done, then i'll post as a new project!

Enjoy and give me some feedback so i can improve it! :D
